snippet: Homebuilder stocks have surged this year, but have they come too far, too fast? Analysts look at the investment options.
abstract: Wall Street seems highly confident that housing is on clear path to recovery, and homebuilder stocks have been some of the strongest market performers of 2012; some analysts say apparent end of housing price slump should help some companies.
lead_paragraph: Homebuilder stocks have surged this year, but have they come too far, too fast? Analysts look at the investment options.

headline.seo: Ways to Play a Recovery in Housing
headline.main: Ways to Play a Recovery in Housing
headline.print_headline: Ways to Play A Recovery In Housing
